sentences.text: February 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: am pleased to invite you to attend our annual meeting to be held at Fastenal's home office at 2001 Theurer Boulevard, Winona, Minnesota ommencing at 10:00 a.m., central time, on Tuesday, April 25, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice of annual meeting and the proxy statement, which follow, describe the matters to come before the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the annual meeting, we will also review the activities of the past year and items of general interest about Fastenal and will be pleased to answer your questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please join us for lunch immediately following the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year we are again taking advantage of a Securities and Exchange Commission rule allowing us to furnish our proxy materials over the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder who holds shares in an account with a broker (also referred to as shares held in 'street name'), you will receive a notice regarding availability of proxy materials by mail from your broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice will tell you how you can access our proxy materials and provide voting instructions to your broker over the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It will also tell you how to request a paper or e-mail copy of our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder whose shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent, Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (a 'registered shareholder'), you will continue to receive a copy of our proxy materials by mail as in previous years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We hope that you will be able to attend the annual meeting in person and we look forward to seeing you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, your vote is important and we encourage you to vote promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Willard D. Oberton Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FASTENAL COMPANY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of Annual Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tuesday, April 25, 2017 at 10:00 a.m. (central time)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DATE & TIME
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLACE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fastenal Company 2001 Theurer Boulevard Winona, Minnesota 55987 (meeting held in the warehouse)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEMS OF BUSINESS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. The election of a board of directors consisting of ten members to serve until the next regular    meeting of shareholders or until their successors have been duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. The ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. The re-approval of the Fastenal Company Incentive Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. An advisory vote on a non-binding resolution to approve the compensation of certain of our     executive officers disclosed in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. An advisory, non-binding vote to determine the frequency (whether annual, biennial, or triennial)     with which our shareholders shall be entitled to have an advisory vote on executive     compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. The transaction of such other business as may properly be brought before the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote at the annual meeting if you were a shareholder of record at the close of business on February 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT  Your proxy is important to ensure a quorum at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you own only a few shares, and whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, please follow the instructions you received to vote your shares as soon as possible to ensure that your shares are represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John J. Milek General Counsel
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Winona, Minnesota February 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies are being solicited by the board of directors of Fastenal Company (hereinafter referred to as Fastenal or by terms such as the company, we, our, or us) for use in connection with the annual meeting to be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017 at our principal executive office commencing at 10:00 a.m., central time, and at any adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing address of our principal executive office is 2001 Theurer Boulevard, Winona, Minnesota 55987-0978 and our telephone number is (507) 454-5374.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing of this proxy statement and our board of directors' form of proxy to shareholders whose shares are registered directly in their names with our transfer agent ('registered shareholders') will commence on or about March 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing of the notice regarding availability of proxy materials to our shareholders who hold shares in accounts with brokers (also referred to as shares held in 'street name') will commence on or about the same date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General information about the meeting and voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal #1  Election of directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate governance and director compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit and related matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Security ownership of principal shareholders and management 33
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deadlines for receipt of shareholder proposals for the 2018 annual meeting 35
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE MEETING AND VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What am I voting on?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These are the proposals scheduled to be voted on at the annual meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of all ten directors ('Proposal #1');
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adoption of a resolution approving, on an advisory, non-binding basis, the compensation of certain of our executive officers ('Proposal #4'); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of the frequency for future shareholder advisory, non-binding votes on executive compensation ('Proposal #5').
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The common stock of Fastenal, par value $.01 per share, is our only authorized and issued voting security.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on February 24, 2017, there were 289,260,924 shares of common stock issued and outstanding, each of which is entitled to one vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only shareholders of record at the close of business on February 24, 2017 will be entitled to vote at the annual meeting or any adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the annual meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the shares of common stock outstanding at the close of business on the record date will constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are required to approve each proposal?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As is the case this year, where the number of nominees does not exceed the number of directors to be elected, directors are elected under a majority voting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that each director must receive more votes for his or her election than votes against in order to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an incumbent director fails to receive a sufficient number of votes to be elected, he or she must promptly offer to resign, and the nominating committee will make a recommendation on the resignation offer and the board must accept or reject the offer within 90 days an publicly disclose its decision and rationale.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders do not have the right to cumulate their votes in the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the holders of the greater of (1) a majority of the shares of common stock present in person or by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote or (2) a majority of the minimum number of shares entitled to vote that would constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the annual meeting is required for approval of Proposal #2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the holders of the greater of (1) a majority of the shares of common stock present in person or by proxy at the annual meeting and entitled to vote or (2) a majority of the minimum number of shares entitled to vote that would constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the annual meeting, is required for approval of Proposal #3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote to approve our executive compensation is advisory and not binding on our board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, our board will consider our shareholders to have approved our executive compensation if the number of votes 'FOR' Proposal #4 exceeds the number of votes 'AGAINST' Proposal #4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of Frequency of Shareholder Advisory Votes on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal #5, the option receiving the most votes among the choices for frequency of the shareholder advisory vote on executive compensation will be deemed to have received the non-binding approval of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote 'FOR', 'AGAINST' or 'ABSTAIN' on Proposals #1, #2, #3, and #4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote 'FOR 1 YEAR', 'FOR 2 YEARS', 'FOR 3 YEARS' or 'ABSTAIN' on Proposal #5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will be counted as present for purposes of determining the existence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you abstain from voting on Proposal #2 or #3, it has the same effect as a vote against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An abstention will not have any effect on the outcome of the vote on Proposal #1, #4, or #5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you just sign and submit a proxy card without voting instructions, your shares will be voted 'FOR' each director nominee; 'FOR 1 YEAR' as the frequency for future shareholder advisory votes on the approval of executive compensation, and 'FOR' or 'AGAINST' any other proposal as recommended by the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If shareholders do not give their brokers instructions as to how to vote shares held in street name, the brokers have discretionary authority to vote those shares on 'routine' matters, such as the ratification of independent registered public accounting firms, but not on 'non-routine' proposals, such as the other proposals scheduled to be voted on at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, if you hold your shares in street name and do not provide voting instructions to your broker, your shares will not be voted on any proposal on which your broker does not have discretionary authority to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is sometimes called a 'broker non-vote'.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held by brokers who do not have discretionary authority to vote on a particular matter and who have not received voting instructions from their customers will be counted as present for the purpose of determining whether there is a quorum at the annual meeting, but will not be counted or deemed to be present in person or by proxy for the purpose of determining whether our shareholders have approved that matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the board recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fastenal's board recommends that you vote your shares:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 'FOR' each of the nominees to the board named in this proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 'FOR' the adoption of a resolution approving, on an advisory, non-binding basis, the compensation of certain of our executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 'FOR 1 YEAR' as the frequency for future shareholder advisory, non-binding votes on the approval of executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote my shares without attending the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, you may vote without attending the annual meeting by telephone, over the internet, or by mail as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephone, (1) on a touch-tone telephone, call toll-free 1-800-690-6903, 24 hours a day, seven days a week, until 11:59 p.m., eastern time, on April 24, 2017, (2) have your proxy card available, and (3) follow the instructions provided;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the internet, (1) go to www.proxyvote.com, 24 hours a day, seven days a week, until 11:59 p.m., eastern time, on April 24, 2017, (2) have your proxy card available, and (3) follow the instructions provided; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mail, (1) mark, date, and sign the enclosed proxy card, and (2) return the proxy card in the enclosed postage-paid envelope to Fastenal Company, c/o Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should sign your name exactly as it appears on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are signing the proxy card in a representative capacity (for example, as guardian, executor, trustee, custodian, attorney or officer of a corporation), you should indicate your name and title or capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held jointly by two or more registered shareholders may be voted by any joint owner, unless we receive written notice from another oint owner denying the authority of the first joint owner to vote those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name, you will receive a notice regarding availability of proxy materials that will tell you how to access our proxy materials and provide voting instructions to your broker over the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It will also tell you how to request a paper or e-mail copy of our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, if you hold your shares in street name and do not provide voting instructions to your broker, your shares will not be voted on any proposals on which your broker does not have discretionary authority to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Held in the Fastenal Company and Subsidiaries 401(k) and Employee Stock Ownership Plan ('401(k) plan') If you participate in our 401(k) plan and have investments in the Fastenal stock fund, you will receive instructions from the trustee of the plan that you must follow in order for shares attributable to your account to be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The trustee will vote shares for which no directions have been timely received, and shares not credited to any participant's account, in proportion to votes cast by participants who have timely responded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote my shares in person at the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder and prefer to vote your shares at the annual meeting, bring the enclosed proxy card or proof of identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote shares held in street name only if you obtain and bring to the annual meeting a signed proxy from the record holder (broker or other nominee) giving you the right to vote the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares attributable to your account in our 401(k) plan may not be voted by you in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the annual meeting, we encourage you to vote in advance by telephone, over the internet, or by mail so that your vote will be counted if you later decide not to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder who wishes to vote in person at the annual meeting and have previously submitted a proxy, you must deliver to an officer of Fastenal a written notice of termination of the proxy's authority before the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the annual meeting will not itself revoke a previously granted proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, you may revoke your proxy (1) prior to the annual meeting by mailing a later dated proxy or by submitting a subsequent proxy by telephone or over the internet at any time before the applicable deadline noted above, or (2) at the annual meeting by delivering to an officer of Fastenal a written notice of termination of the proxy's authority at any time prior to the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name or through our 401(k) plan and wish to change your vote, you should follow the instructions received from your broker or the trustee of the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL #1ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees and Required Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws provide that our business will be managed by or under the direction of a board of directors of not less than five or more than 12 directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within this range, the exact number of directors is fixed from time to time by the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board currently consists of ten members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director will be elected at the annual meeting for a term that expires at the next regular shareholders' meeting and will hold office for the term for which he or she was elected or until a successor is elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees named below is a current director of Fastenal and has indicated a willingness to be named in this proxy statement and to serve as a director for the ensuing year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees has been previously elected by our shareholders, with the exception of Daniel L. Johnson, who was appointed as a director by our board of directors effective May 24, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies solicited by the board of directors will, unless otherwise directed, be voted to elect the ten nominees named below to constitute the entire board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in case any such nominee is not a candidate at the annual meeting of shareholders for any reason, the proxies named in the enclosed proxy card may vote for a substitute nominee in their discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table sets forth certain information as to each director and nominee for the office of director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Name Age   Director Since  Position Willard D. Oberton 58   1999  Chairman of the Board and Director Michael J. Ancius 52   2009  Director Michael J. Dolan 68   2000  Director Stephen L. Eastman 52   2015  Director Daniel L. Florness 53   2016  President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director Rita J. Heise 60   2012  Director Darren R. Jackson 52   2012  Director Daniel L. Johnson 53   2016  Director Scott A. Satterlee 48   2009  Director Reyne K. Wisecup 54   2000  Senior Executive Vice President  Human Resources and Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fastenal's board of directors is comprised of a diverse group of individuals of varying backgrounds and experiences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our management directors bring important internal insights and perspective developed during their years of experience in operations and administration at the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They provide direct-line feedback for the people-centered culture that has played a major role in the company's success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independent directors contribute a variety of expertise derived from their backgrounds in the areas of entrepreneurial leadership, strategic planning, multi-location sales and marketing, manufacturing, distribution, commercial construction, international market development, information technology, publicly-held company reporting, professional administration, investor relations, risk management, and accounting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board believes each of the nominees possesses the experience, skills, and attributes to serve on the company's board of directors, and collectively contribute to its ongoing success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Willard D. Oberton has served as chairman of the board since April 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also served as the company's chief executive officer from December 2002 through December 2014, when he retired from that position, and again on an interim basis from July 2015 through December 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He began his business career with Fastenal in January 1980, and was promoted to branch manager, then district manager, and later to general operations manager.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as our vice president from March 1997 through June 2000, as our executive vice president from June 2000 through July 2001, as our chief operating officer from March 1997 through December 2002, and as our president from July 2001 through July 2012 and again on an interim basis from July 2015 through December 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton's professional career grew from within Fastenal as he successfully worked, managed, and provided leadership to most of the departments and disciplines integral to the company's growth and financial success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton's varied experience with the company, including his long tenure as chief executive officer, gives the board unique insight into the company's 'success drivers' and provides continuity to Mr. Florness in the development and execution of the company's strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Oberton serves on the board of directors of publicly-held Donaldson Company, which gives him useful insight into another organization's corporate governance, compensation planning, and strategic development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, he serves on the board of WinCraft, Inc., a privately-held company involved in manufacturing and distributing promotional marketing merchandise, which are important disciplines helpful to Fastenal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, he has served on the boards of various community and educational organizations, including the board of trustees of St. Benedict's College, St. Joseph, Minnesota.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton has been a director of Fastenal since 1999.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Michael J. Ancius serves as the director of strategic planning, financing, and taxation of Kwik Trip, Inc., a position he has held since 1997.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kwik Trip is a privately-held multi-location retail convenience store chain and food processing and logistics company headquartered n La Crosse, Wisconsin, with $4.5 billion in annual revenues and over 18,000 employees at over 500 locations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to 1997, Mr. Ancius was a senior manager with the certified public accounting firm of RSM US LLP for ten years, where he specialized in taxation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His background in strategic planning, board operations, capital markets, capital structures and valuations, insurance risk management, taxation, and financial and accounting matters contributes a unique set of skills to the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, his involvement with Kwik Trip's strategic planning and development of Kwik Trip's compensation strategies brings beneficial insight to our compensation committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ancius has been a director of Fastenal since 2009 and is a member of our compensation committee and chair of our nominating committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Michael J. Dolan has worked as a business consultant since March 2001.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From October 1995 through February 2001, he served as executive vice president and chief operating officer of The Smead Manufacturing Company, participating in the management and leadership of that privately-owned manufacturer of office filing products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to 1995, Mr. Dolan was a partner in the international audit and accounting firm of KPMG LLP, which assisted in taking Fastenal public in 1987.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was associated with KPMG LLP for a total of twenty- five years during which time he specialized in advising distribution, transportation, and manufacturing companies, several of which were publicly-held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His operations background in manufacturing, multi-location distribution, transportation, and marketing serves the board and company in these areas integral to Fastenal's business, and provides experience in evaluating business risk as well as opportunity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His financial background and experience in accounting and reporting matters and in advising publicly-held companies provides the experience needed to chair the company's audit and compensation committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has also served on various community and educational boards, including the board of trustees of St. Mary's University, Winona, Minnesota.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Dolan has been a director of Fastenal since 2000, is a member of our nominating committee, and is chair of our audit and compensation committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Stephen L. Eastman, has served as president of the parts, garments, and accessories division of Polaris Industries Inc., a manufacturer and marketer of recreational vehicles with $4.5 billion in annual revenues, a position he has held since August 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In his capacity as president, he is responsible for leading the strategic direction, product development, supply chain operations, sales, marketing, and e- commerce of the parts, garments, and accessories division.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From February 2012 to August 2015, he served as vice president of that same division.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence and Other Board Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board of directors has determined that none of Mr. Ancius, Mr. Dolan, Mr. Eastman, Ms. Heise, Mr. Jackson, Mr. Johnson, or Mr. Satterlee has any relationships that would interfere with the exercise by such person of independent judgment in the carrying out of his or her responsibilities as a director and that each such individual is an independent director under the listing standards of the NASDAQ Stock Market (herein referred to as 'independent directors').
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors constitute a majority of our board of directors and a majority of the nominees for the office of director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making the board's independence determination, the members of the board were aware of and considered various transactions between Fastenal, on the one hand, and companies in or with respect to which certain of our directors have equity interests or serve as directors, officers, or employees, on the other hand.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those transactions consisted of the purchase of products by such companies from Fastenal in the ordinary course of business and on terms available to comparable unrelated customers in similar circumstances, and the purchase by Fastenal of products or services from such companies in the ordinary course of business on terms negotiated on an arm's-length basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of our directors were in any way directly involved with any of these transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All interested parties, including our shareholders, may contact our board of directors by e-mail addressed to bod@fastenal.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered or beneficial owners of our common stock should identify themselves in their e-mails as shareholders of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive assistant to our chief executive officer periodically reviews all such e-mails and forwards all communications from our shareholders, and all communications from other interested parties requiring board attention, to the chairman of the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have no formal policy regarding attendance by directors at our annual meeting, although most of our directors have historically attended this meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each individual serving as a director of the company at that time attended our 2016 annual meeting.

sentences.text: Board Oversight of Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors recognizes that, although risk management is a primary responsibility of the company's management, the board plays a critical role in oversight of risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board, in order to more specifically carry out this responsibility, has
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assigned the audit committee the primary duty to periodically review the company's policies and practices with respect to risk assessment and risk management, including discussing with management the company's major risk exposures and the steps that have been taken to monitor and control those exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation committee has been assigned the duty to assess the impact of the company's compensation programs on risk and recommend to the board of directors the adoption of any policies deemed necessary or advisable in order to mitigate compensation related risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information on the compensation committee's involvement in risk assessment and management as they relate to compensation programs is provided below under 'Executive Compensation-Compensation Discussion and Analysis.'
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee reports to the board ensuring the board's full involvement in carrying out its responsibility for risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board's oversight role in this area has not affected its leadership structure, largely because of the level of direct communication between various members of senior management and the board and its committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure and Committee Membership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton has been the chairman of the board of the company since April 2014, and served as chief executive officer from December 2002 through December 2014, when he retired from that position, and again on an interim basis from July 2015 through December 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the election of Mr. Florness as chief executive officer of the company effective January 1, 2016, the roles of chairman and chief executive officer were separated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, separation of the two offices is not mandated by any corporate governance guidelines of the company and continued separation of the roles will depend upon specific circumstances and the experience and background of the company's leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As chairman, Mr. Oberton is the primary liaison between senior management and the independent directors and provides strategic input and leadership to our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With input from the other board members, committee chairs, and management, he develops the agenda for board meetings, sets board meeting schedules, and presides over meetings of the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the company's chairman, former chief executive officer and a board member for over seventeen years, Mr. Oberton combines a detailed and in-depth knowledge of the company's day-to-day operations with an ability to identify strategic priorities essential to the future success of the company and effectively execute the company's strategic plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton is not responsible for setting agendas for executive sessions of the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead that duty is currently performed by Mr. Dolan with input from the company's other independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Dolan's role in establishing agendas for the executive sessions helps assure that those sessions remain effective forums for promoting open and candid discussion among the independent directors regarding issues of importance to the company, including evaluating the performance and effectiveness of members of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this time our independent directors have determined not to appoint one of their members to serve as lead independent director due to their view that all of the independent directors should feel equally engaged, responsible for, and involved in, company affairs and that appointment of a single individual to serve as lead independent director would run counter to that objective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we had three standing board committees, consisting of an audit committee, a compensation committee, and a nominating committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of these committees during 2016, and the number of meetings held by the board and by each committee during 2016, are detailed below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each incumbent director attended more than 75% of the aggregate number of meetings in 2016 of the board and the various committees on which he or she served that were held during his or her term of service on the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee consists of four directors, each of whom is an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board of directors has determined that Mr. Dolan and Mr. Jackson are 'audit committee financial experts' under the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the 'SEC').
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee is responsible for overseeing our management and independent registered public accounting firm as to corporat accounting, financial reporting, internal controls, audit matters, and corporate risk management, and has the authority to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and discuss with our management and independent registered public accounting firm our interim and audited annual financial statements, and recommend to our board whether the audited annual financial statements should be included in our annua report on Form 10-K;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and discuss with management our major risk exposures and the steps that management has taken to monitor and control such exposures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Monitor the independence of our independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review related person transactions for potential conflict-of-interest situations; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establish procedures for the receipt, retention, and treatment of complaints regarding accounting, internal controls, or auditing matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee operates under a written charter originally adopted by our board of directors in June 2000 and most recently amended in January 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee reviews its charter on an annual basis to determine if any amendments are needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the current charter is available on the Corporate Governance page of the Investors section of our website at www.fastenal.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Person Transaction Approval Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2007, our board of directors adopted a formal written related person transaction approval policy, which sets out our policies and procedures for the review, approval, or ratification of 'related person transactions'.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these purposes, a 'related person' is a director, nominee for director, executive officer, or holder of more than 5% of our common stock, or any immediate family member of any of the foregoing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy is reviewed periodically to determine if any amendments are needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the current policy is available on the Corporate Governance page of the Investors section of our website at www.fastenal.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy applies to any financial transaction, arrangement, or relationship or any series of similar financial transactions, arrangements, or relationships in which Fastenal is a participant and in which a related person has a direct or indirect interest, other than the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of compensation by Fastenal to a related person for the related person's service in the capacity or capacities that give rise to the person's status as a 'related person';
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: other customers, regardless of whether the transactions are required to be reported in Fastenal's filings with the SEC; and  Transactions, which when aggregated with the amount of all other transactions between the related person and Fastenal, involve less than $120,000 in a year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee is required to approve any related person transaction subject to this policy before commencement of the related person ransaction, provided that if the related person transaction is identified after it commences, it must be brought to the audit committee for ratification, amendment, or rescission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairman of our audit committee has the authority to approve or take other actions in respect of any related person transaction that arises, or first becomes known, between meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: of the audit committee, provided that any action by the chairman must be reported to our audit committee at its next regularly scheduled meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee will analyze the following factors, in addition to any other factors the members of the audit committee deem appropriate, in determining whether to approve a related person transaction:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether the terms are fair to Fastenal;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether the transaction is material to Fastena
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role the related person has played in arranging the related person transaction;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The interests of all related persons in the related person transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee may, in its sole discretion, approve or deny any related person transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of a related person transaction may be conditioned upon Fastenal and the related person following certain procedures designated by the audit committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions with Related Persons
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

Miller (a former director of Fastenal who retired from service on our board effective April 19, 2016), purchased approximately $593,000 in products from Fastenal during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purchases were in the ordinary course of business and on erms available to comparable unrelated customers in similar circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Miller did not participate in the negotiation of RTP's contract with Fastenal.

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee was appointed by our board of directors to discharge the board's responsibilities relating to compensation of Fastenal's executive officers and to oversee and advise the board on the adoption of policies that govern our compensation and benefit programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee consists of four directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of our compensation committee qualifies as an independen director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee has the authority to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Evaluate our chief executive officer's performance, and determine and approve all elements of our chief executive officer's compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the evaluations of the performance of our other executive officers, and approve all elements of their compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and approve all changes in Fastenal's benefit plans which could result in material changes in costs or the benefit levels provided;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee may delegate to our chief executive officer the authority, within pre-existing guidelines established by the compensation committee, to approve awards of equity-based compensation under established plans to employees other than executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our chief executive officer may be present during deliberations of the compensation committee on the compensation of our other executive officers (but not his own) and may provide input at the request of the compensation committee on that compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, he may not vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee operates under a written charter originally adopted by our board of directors in February 2007, and most recently amended and restated in January 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation committee reviews its charter on an annual basis to determine if any amendments are needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the current charter is available on the Corporate Governance page of the Investors section of our web site at www.fastenal.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee Interlocks and Insider Participation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the members of our compensation committee has ever been an officer or employee of Fastenal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, no executive officer of Fastenal served as a member of the board of directors or compensation committee (or other board committee performing equivalent functions) of any other entity that had any of its executive officers serving as a member of our board of directors or compensation committee.

sentences.text: Compensation of our Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation committee makes recommendations regarding director compensation to the full board and the board makes the final decision regarding director compensation after consideration of such recommendations.

sentences.text: All of our directors, including our chief executive officer, participated in the deliberations of the board regarding director compensation for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, each of our non-employee directors received an annual retainer of $55,000 and each of our employee directors received an annual retainer of $27,500 for his or her services as a director, except that Mr. Miller and Mr. Hein, who did not stand for reelection to the board in 2016, received an annual retainer of $18,333 and $9,167, respectively (or approximately one-third of a full year's retainer), and Mr. Johnson, who was elected to the board effective May 24, 2016, received an annual retainer of $27,500 (or one-half of a full year's retainer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the chair of the audit committee received an annual retainer of $25,000, the chair of the compensation committee received an annual retainer of $10,000, and the chair of the nominating committee received an annual retainer of $10,000.

sentences.text: The annual retainers were paid at the first meeting of the year, except that Mr. Johnson's retainer was paid at the time he was elected to the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our non-employee directors, other than Mr. Oberton, also received $4,000 for attendance at each regular or special meeting of the board and each committee meeting.

sentences.text: Mr. Oberton received a monthly retainer of $30,000 in lieu of meeting attendance fees.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Miller served as a member of our audit and compensation committees until his retirement from the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective December 2016, the board approved a fee of $4,000 for attendance by independent directors at each separate meeting of the independent board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective January 2017, the board also increased the annual retainer for non-employee directors to $85,000, increased the annual retainer for employee directors to $42,500, and decreased the monthly retainer for Mr. Oberton in lieu of meeting attendance fees to $25,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other elements of director compensation were unchanged.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee assists the board in maintaining effective governance of the company by identifying and recommending to the board appropriate candidates to serve as directors of the company and periodically assessing the composition of our board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee consists of three directors, each of whom qualifies as an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee has the authority to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Periodically review the composition, skills, and qualifications of members of the board and recommend any changes to the board in its size or composition;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Engage in succession planning for the chairman of the board and other board members;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommend to the board candidates for election as directors at the annual shareholders meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consider any resignations tendered by directors and recommend appropriate action to the board in response; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regularly review its performance and the adequacy of its charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee operates under a written charter originally adopted by our board of directors in January 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominating committee reviews its charter on an annual basis to determine if any amendments are needed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the current charter is available on the Corporate Governance page of the Investors section of our website at www.fastenal.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee believes the following qualifications, skills and attributes are necessary for the company's directors:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Integrity, intelligence, good judgment, ambition, and innovation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Loyalty to our company and concern for its success and welfare;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An awareness of a director's vital part in our good corporate citizenship
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time available for meetings and consultation on company matters;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The commitment to serve as a director for a reasonable period of time; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In selecting and evaluating director candidates, the nominating committee also considers an individual's business, employment and educational background, leadership experience in business or administrative activities, breadth of knowledge about issues affecting our company, and ability to contribute complementary expertise to board or committee activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2012, the board adopted an 'age-limitation' policy relating to service on the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy provided that no person would be nominated by the board for election by the shareholders of the company to the board, or appointed by the directors of the company to fill a vacancy on the board, during any year if such person is 74 years of age or older on January 1st of such year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In October 2016, the board amended this policy to decrease the maximum age from 74 years to 72 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although our board does not have a formal policy relating specifically to the consideration of diversity in the selection and evaluation of director nominees, it does seek a diversity of perspectives, backgrounds, and life experiences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominating committee is mindful of the board's view in this regard in discharging its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, after consultation with the full board and members of management to determine the needs of the company for new directors, the nominating committee decides to recommend the addition of one or more directors, or if a vacancy occurs on the board that the nominating committee determines should be filled, the process described below will be followed by the nominating committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With input from the chairman of the board, it will initiate the search for director candidates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identify a slate of candidates for consideration;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conduct inquiries into the background and qualifications of identified candidates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approve a candidate for recommendation to the board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee has the authority to retain search firms to assist in identifying and evaluating director candidates, as well as any other advisors as the nominating committee determines necessary to carry out its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fastenal is required to provide appropriate funding, as determined by our nominating committee, for payment of compensation to any search firm or other advisors so employed by the nominating committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee will consider director candidates recommended by our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates recommended by our shareholders will be evaluated in the same manner as other candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may recommend candidates by sending an e-mail to nominate@fastenal.com or by writing to Nominating Committee, Fastenal Company, 2001 Theurer Boulevard, Winona, Minnesota 55987 and providing that candidate's name, biographical data, and qualifications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Board Evaluations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nominating committee reviews the composition, skills and qualifications of the individual members of our board of directors on an annual basis, and reports to the board of directors regarding suggested changes in size or composition of the board of directors and any succession planning for the chairman of the board and other board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the 'Exchange Act') requires our directors and officers to file initial reports of share ownership and reports of changes in share ownership with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors and officers are required by SEC regulations to furnish us with copies of all Section 16(a) forms they file.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based solely on a review of the copies of such forms furnished to us and written representations from our directors and officers, all Section 16(a) filing requirements were met for 2016, except that the Form 4 for Mr. Satterlee's acquisition of 2,500 shares on February 8, 2016 was filed two days late.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL #2  RATIFICATION OF APPOINTMENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee has selected KPMG LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While it is not required to do so, the audit committee is submitting the selection of KPMG LLP for ratification by our shareholders in order to ascertain the view of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the selection is not ratified, the audit committee will reconsider its selection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies solicited by our board of directors will, unless otherwise directed, be voted to ratify the selection of KPMG LLP as our ndependent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative of KPMG LLP will be present at the annual meeting and will be afforded an opportunity to make a statement if such representative so desires and will be available to respond to appropriate questions during the meeting.

sentences.text: AUDIT AND RELATED MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted earlier, our audit committee oversees the company's financial accounting and reporting processes and systems of internal controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In performing its oversight function, our audit committee relies upon advice and information received from Fastenal's management and independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that regard, our audit committee has reviewed and discussed with both the management of the company and representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm our audited consolidated financial statements for 2016, as well as management's assessment o the effectiveness of our internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management represented to our audit committee as part of those discussions that our audited consolidated financial statements were prepared in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee also discussed with our internal auditors and representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm the overall scope and plans for their respective audits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee met with the internal auditors and representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm, with and without management present, to discuss the results of their audits, their evaluations of our internal controls, including internal control over financial reporting, and the overall quality of our financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee further discussed with representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm the matters required to be discussed with audit committees by the applicable Public Company Accounting Oversight Board's standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee also received the written disclosures and the letter from our independent registered public accounting firm required by the Public Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accounting Oversight Board regarding our independent registered public accounting firm's
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: communications with the audit committee concerning independence, and discussed with representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm the independence of that firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions referred to above, our audit committee recommended to our board of directors that our audited financia statements for 2016 be included in our 2016 annual report on Form 10-K for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael J. Dolan (Chair) Stephen L. Eastman Darren R. Jackson Daniel L. Johnson Members of the Audit Committee

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Principal Accountant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our audit committee has considered whether, and has determined that, the provision of the services described above was compatible with maintaining the independence of our independent registered public accounting firm.

sentences.text: Pre-Approval of Services
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and the rules of the SEC regarding auditor independence require the pre-approval by our audit committee or pursuant to pre-approval policies and procedures established by our audit committee of audit and non-audit services provided to us by our principal accountant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the services were pre- approved in accordance with our pre-approval policy, and none of the services provided to us by our independent registered public accounting firm in 2016 or 2015 were approved retroactively pursuant to the exception to the pre-approval requirements for de minimis non- audit services described above.
